description.value:
Trigger Slick drinks Gattlebee's growth serum

Effect The giant lizard bumps into lab tables and workbenches, causing dangerous ingredients to intermix and detonate. The hazard rolls initiative.

details.description: Potion bottles, alembics, and potent ingredients violently explode when jostled and accidentally combined.
details.disable: Three @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20|name:Sort and separate the ingredients|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental] or @Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Sort and separate the ingredients|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental] checks to sort and separate the bottles of volatile ingredients into groups
details.reset: The lab contains enough ingredients for this hazard to last 1 minute before all materials are expended. Alternatively, the hazard resets once Slick shrinks to regular size.
details.routine: (1 action) A random 10-foot square in Gattlebee's laboratory explodes, dealing [[/r 2d6]] damage to creatures and objects in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true|traits:alchemical,hazard,complex,environmental]). The damage type is randomly determined each round: acid, cold, electricity, fire, slashing, or sonic.

source.value: Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powder Keg
